articles.author: Julie Bort
articles.title: Why a Y Combinator startup tackling AI agents for Windows gave up and pivoted - TechCrunch
articles.description: Pig.dev was working on a problem that could have been revolutionary: agent tech for controlling Windows desktops.
articles.content:
A startup called Pig.dev that participated in Y Combinator’s Winter 2025 batch was working on a potentially revolutionary idea: AI agentic tech to control a Microsoft Windows desktop.
But in May, th… [+3416 chars]

articles.title: Babies born in UK with DNA from 3 people: Medical breakthrough could prevent genetic disorders - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Genetic Breakthrough: UK confirms 8 babies born using 3-person IVF technique to block inherited diseases; MDT offers new hope for families.
